function.description: Performs a web search and summarizes the results. Web search topics can range from weather, to sports, politics, technology, and any number of other unspecified topics.
function.name: search_and_summarize_the_web

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: Web search terms or questions to be answered and summarized

parameter.name: information_is_dynamic
parameter.description: Is this a search for information that is dynamic and continually updated on the web (True), or is it static knowledge (False)?

parameter.name: time_frame
parameter.description: What is the timeframe for our web search: today, yesterday, last week, last year etc.

function.description: Searches the memory table to find KNN topics. This is where we store past conversations about any number of topics. This damn thing Zack and dumber NOTE: This is designed to support the notion of an AI's long-term memory of conversations with humans
function.name: query_memory_table_for_knn_topics

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: The question, verbatim, that the topic, or topics, are derived from

parameter.name: topics
parameter.description: The topic, or topics, to search the memory table for

return-value.name: topics
return-value.description: A list of similar topic strings

function.description: Searches the memory table to find KNN topics by specific date or date range. NOTE: This is designed to support the notion of an AI's long-term memory of conversations with humans
function.name: query_memory_table_by_date_for_knn_topics

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: The question, verbatim, that the topic, or topics, are derived from

parameter.name: topics
parameter.description: The topic, or topics, to search the memory table for

parameter.name: start_date
parameter.description: What is the start date of the search?. Defaults to "2024-04-01"

parameter.name: end_date
parameter.description: What is the end date of the search?. Defaults to whatever today's date is, using "YYYY-MM-DD"

return-value.name: topics
return-value.description: A list of similar topic strings, filtered by date
